abstract: Abstract The present study provides information on the ecology of four species of land snail which are distributed in the north region of the Republic of Yemen (NY). These are Eurypryxis labiosa, Euryptyxis fragosa, Zebrinops albata and Macroptychia sumarana. In addition, Revoilia bentianum and the slug Laevicaulis alte are recorded for the first time from northern Yemen and from Yemen as a whole respectively.
